name: Wrath of the Stormcaller
description:
Wrath of the Stormcaller is a roguelike action hack and slash game. Fight through waves of enemies and upgrade your character through card drops and pick ups. 

Fight your way through the dungeon and Defeat the Stormcaller. Bring an end to the Storm brought upon us.

Features

Choose unique upgrades

Use skills to defeat enemies

Dodge enemy attacks
